examples: Your ability to speak six languages amazes me!

results.definition: be a mystery or bewildering to
examples: Got me--I don't know the answer!
she does an amazing amount of work
the dog was capable of astonishing tricks

results.definition: inspiring awe or admiration or wonder
examples: New York is an amazing city
the Grand Canyon is an awe-inspiring sight
the awesome complexity of the universe
this sea, whose gently awful stirrings seem to speak of some hidden soul beneath"- Melville
Westminster Hall's awing majesty, so vast, so high, so silent
